name: McLean Bronze Still Life #1
description:
9" x 9"

We approach each bronze wall tile as a still life- a study in color, composition and texture.  

Each unique tile is a bronze construction- welded, machined and colored with a hot process patina.  Antique and glass beads are collected and used as found objects.  The beads come from all over the world; some of the oldest beads have circumvented the globe many times over hundreds of years.  

The beads on Still Life #1 include a stack of palm nut and ostrich shell discs, Venetian glass, and  patinated copper pipe fitting with a clam shell topper.

Your purchase includes a card describing our concept, process, and the beads included on your unique piece. 

Please visit our website http://www.mcleanbronze.com/ for information about our bronze welding and hot patina processes, and to view additional wall tiles.

Jack and Alice McLean

name: Little Deep Boat
description:
6" x 6" x 2"

Each piece in our "Little Deep Boat" series is a unique welded bronze construction with hot process patina.

In the early stages of a new series, the act of making feeds on potential, like coal car and locomotive.  The boat under construction is already showing me the next one.  Two boats show connectedness, three or more become a stream of consciousness to be changed and arranged.

Your purchase includes a card describing our concept and process.

Please visit our website http://www.mcleanbronze.com/ for information about our bronze welding and hot patina processes, and to view additional work.

Jack and Alice McLean
